column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsia dubiako no
column4: bosoom no ne da a odzi kan no
column5: na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ
column10: na ne nyimpadodow no dɛ; Etse dɛ woana wɔ w’akɛseyɛ mu?"

column3: Asirianyi no yɛɛ dɛ Lebanon nkyindur ndua a n’abaw fɛɛfɛw
column5: na ne tsentsen krɔn; na n’etsifi du nsuwusiw ntamu."

column3: ebun no maa onyinii: n’esutsen pemee bɔɔ n’atsɛwndua ho aprɔw; na ɔmaa n’esuka dur kwaa mu ndua nyina ho."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi no krɔn yɛɛ sorɔnsorɔm seen kwaa mu ndua nyinara; na no nkorbata yɛɛ dodow
column3: na no ndubaa yɛɛ atsentsen wɔ nsu dodow a onyae ntsi
column4: wɔ ber a ɔtotoo hɔn no."

column2: "Ɔsor nnoma nyina yeyɛɛ hɔn mberɛbuw wɔ no nkorbata no mu
column3: na no ndubaa no ase na hambowa nyina wowoo hɔn mba
column4: na n’ase nwinwin na amanaman akɛse nyina tsenae."

column2: "Dɛm na no ho yɛɛ fɛw wɔ n’akɛseyɛ mu
column3: wɔ no ndubaa n’atsentsen ntsi: osiandɛ no ndwow wɔ esu pii ho."

column2: "Nyankopɔn ture mu odum enntum ammfa no ennsuma: ɔpepeaa annyɛ dɛ no nkorbata no; na papaa annyɛ dɛ n’abaw akɛse no: eso dua biara nnyi Nyankopɔn no ture mu a ɔtse dɛ ɔno wɔ n’ahoɔfɛw mu."
"Meyɛɛ no fɛɛfɛw wɔ no ndubaa dodow ntsi: ma Eden ndua a wɔwɔ Nyankopɔn ture mu nyinara enyi beer no."
"Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Osiandɛ awar kronn
column3: na ɔama ne tsentsen ano ekodu nsuwusiw mu
column4: na ɔama n’akoma do wɔ no krɔn mu ntsi
column6: "medze no mebɛhyɛ amanaman mu otumfo no nsa mpo; ɔnye no bedzi ara ampa: n’emumuyɛ ntsi na meyi no edzi."

column5: na wɔadan no egya: mbepɔw do na mbɔnsa nyina mu na no ndubaa abɔhwe
column6: na no nkorbata ebubu wɔ asaase no do esuka no ho; na asaase no do aman no nyinara efi no nwinwin ase esian kɔ

column2: "No kukuw a osi famu no do na ɔsor nnoma nyinara bɛgyegye
column3: na hambowa nyinara bɛtsena no ndubaa do:"

column2: "ma eekodu dɛ esu no ho ndua no mu biara nnkɛma hɔnho do wɔ hɔn krɔn mu
column3: eso wɔaamma hɔn tsentsen ano annkɔ nsuwusiw mu
column4: eso amma hɔn etumfo no aammema hɔnho do wɔ hɔn krɔn mu
column5: mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔnom nsu nyinara: osiandɛ woeyi hɔn nyinara ama wu
column8: akɛka hɔn a wosian kɔ mona mu no ho."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Da a osianee kɔr samanadze no
column3: memaa nkɔmbɔdzi bae: ɔno ntsi mekataa ebun no do
column5: na esu akɛse no siankae: na memaa Lebanon twaa ewuo wɔ ne ntsi
column6: na hamu ndua nyinara tɔɔ bitsi wɔ ne ntsi."

column2: "Memaa amanaman wosowee wɔ n’asehwe ne dede ntsi
column3: ber a motoow no hwee famu kɔtɔɔ samanadze kɛkaa hɔn a wosian kɔ mona mu nyinara ho: na Eden ndua nyina
column4: Lebanon dze dza wɔasan mu eyi na oye kyɛn no
column6: wɔkyekyee hɔn werɛ wɔ daadzetsirmu no ho."

column2: "Hɔn so wɔnye no sianee kɔr samanadze kɛkaa hɔn a wɔatotɔ afona ano no ho; nyew
column3: hɔn a nkyɛ wɔyɛ ne basa a wɔtsena no nwinwin ase wɔ amanaman mu."

column2: "Woana na enye no sɛ dɛm wɔ enyimnyam na akɛseyɛ mu wɔ Eden ndua no mu? Naaso wɔdze wo bɛka Eden ndua no ho esian akɔ daadzetsirmu no ho: ebɛda monomonomfo mu
column3: wɔ hɔn a wɔatotɔ afona ano no nkyɛn. Iyi nye Farao na ne nyimpadodow nyinara
